titles.title: A bill to direct the Office of National Drug Control Policy to track and review federally funded drug demand reduction activities.
A bill to direct the Office of National Drug Control Policy to track and review federally funded drug demand reduction activities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill directs the Office of National Drug Control Policy (ONDCP) to track and review federally funded activities (other than enforcement activities) to reduce the use of drugs. The ONDCP must publish a list of federal programs and grants related to such activities.
